sections.heading: damages are recoverable, the plaintiff may claim and recover any rate of damages to which he may be entitled for the cause of action established
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code § 319, p. 448;R.S.1913, § 7887;C.S.1922, § 8829;C.S.1929, § 20-1146;R.S.1943, § 25-1146.AnnotationsPublic perceptions of a defect when
